casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Angelo WHITEHEAD 465P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017

Ms. Sharon L. Smith, Attorney at Law, For Whitehead, Christopher Angelo.

Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Mr. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, For State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of February 2017 by Defendant to Deem Response Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
